about_the_game:
You find yourself in a peculiar magical laboratory, surrounded by mysterious objects and strange sensations. The only familiarities are the voices of your companions in your head, who you can curiously hear, but not see. Work together to explore your surroundings, solve mind-bending puzzles, and unravel the mystery of The Solace Paradox.



The Solace Paradox is a 2-4 player cooperative first-person puzzle game designed for both veteran puzzle enthusiasts and casual sleuths alike, with a focus on communication and story rather than timers and skill-based challenges. Each of you finds yourself in a different variation of the game world containing puzzles, clues, lore, and items unique to you.

Help each other solve puzzles and discover the story by uncovering the similarities and differences between your worlds. There is no network connection between the games, so communication is key to unlocking the secrets of the island.



  • Enjoy a 2-4 player cooperative puzzle-solving adventure.
  • Conquer complex challenges in communication-based gameplay.
  • Accessible mechanics with an easy learning curve for new gamers.
  • Does not require a network connection; play remotely via your favorite voice app, or on separate devices in the same room.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000-series or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 750 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Audio device required, headphones recommended. Player communication requires third-party voice apps if playing remotely.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000-series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
